content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
RISK-ON environment: low volatility (Vol: 15.7%) and broad participation (Breadth: 7/8 sectors positive).

2. Which sectors are leading?
Transportation and Holding & Investment leading: THYAO (1W: +9.68% | 1M: +8.47%) ABOVE TREND; KCHOL (1W: +8.41% | 1M: +5.78%) ABOVE TREND; Retail & Food also strong: MGROS (1W: +12.64% | 1M: +13.08%) ABOVE TREND.

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Technology & Telecom and Energy & Chemicals lag: KONTR (1W: -8.94% | 1M: -26.69%) BELOW TREND; SASA (1W: -8.99% | 1M: -13.36%) BELOW TREND, while Energy broadly is mixed with several recoveries.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
HALKB (1W: +15.23% | 1M: +12.95%) ABOVE TREND; ASELS (1W: +13.40% | 1M: +30.07%) ABOVE TREND; MGROS (1W: +12.64% | 1M: +13.08%) ABOVE TREND; TOASO (1W: +11.74% | 1M: +16.75%) ABOVE TREND; TRMET (1W: +11.49% | 1M: +15.94%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
PETKM (1W: +2.59% | 1M: -4.37%) RECOVERY; OYAKC (1W: +2.08% | 1M: -6.44%) RECOVERY; VESTL (1W: +0.98% | 1M: -12.82%) RECOVERY; HEKTS (1W: -2.61% | 1M: -8.02%) BELOW TREND; KONTR (1W: -8.94% | 1M: -26.69%) BELOW TREND.

6. Momentum Stocks?
Biggest 1W movers: HALKB (1W: +15.23% | 1M: +12.95%) ABOVE TREND; ASELS (1W: +13.40% | 1M: +30.07%) ABOVE TREND; MGROS (1W: +12.64% | 1M: +13.08%) ABOVE TREND; TOASO (1W: +11.74% | 1M: +16.75%) ABOVE TREND; TRMET (1W: +11.49% | 1M: +15.94%) ABOVE TREND.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Banking remains a clear leader: AKBNK (1W: +4.15% | 1M: +4.91%) ABOVE TREND; GARAN (1W: +1.60% | 1M: +3.70%) ABOVE TREND; VAKBN (1W: +9.00% | 1M: +7.73%) ABOVE TREND; TSKB (1W: +9.07% | 1M: +2.59%) ABOVE TREND — momentum intact, prefer overweight on large-cap banks.

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Heavy industry showing broad strength: EREGL (1W: +3.78% | 1M: +1.98%) ABOVE TREND; TOASO (1W: +11.74% | 1M: +16.75%) ABOVE TREND; ASELS (1W: +13.40% | 1M: +30.07%) ABOVE TREND; FROTO (1W: +5.88% | 1M: +7.39%) ABOVE TREND — cyclicals leading the rally.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Energy mixed and patchy: TUPRS (1W: +6.67% | 1M: -0.41%) RECOVERY; TRMET (1W: +11.49% | 1M: +15.94%) ABOVE TREND; PETKM (1W: +2.59% | 1M: -4.37%) RECOVERY; SASA (1W: -8.99% | 1M: -13.36%) BELOW TREND — selective exposure only.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Risk-ON: overweight cyclical leaders (transportation, retail, select banks and autos), trim exposure to weak tech and structurally challenged chemicals, take profits on short-term strong performers as participation is broadening.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
ASELS (1W: +13.40% | 1M: +30.07%) ABOVE TREND; HALKB (1W: +15.23% | 1M: +12.95%) ABOVE TREND; TOASO (1W: +11.74% | 1M: +16.75%) ABOVE TREND; MGROS (1W: +12.64% | 1M: +13.08%) ABOVE TREND; TRMET (1W: +11.49% | 1M: +15.94%) ABOVE TREND.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Transportation and Retail & Food for continued leadership; monitor Technology & Telecom for downside risk and Energy & Chemicals for divergence between winners and laggards.

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Watch XU100 proximity to its 20-day trend for continuation; catalysts: Q4 earnings, CBRT or macro commentary, FX flows and commodity price moves that will re-rate banks, energy and industrials.

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
RISK-ON market with low volatility (Vol: 15.7%) and 7/8 sectors positive; leadership is broad across transportation, retail and banks. Trade overweight cyclicals and high-quant names (CCOLA, SOKM, TRMET) while defending against tech weakness (KONTR) and select chemical routs (SASA).
